post.body: all i want is an apology. They behave as if they don't know anything is wrong.
yeah. It's great every time. Incredibly frustrated with bad service 2day. 30 hours late now!
Yay, and then it's beers time!!!
Can't confirm, but I suspect so. The troj installs something called WinXPAntiSpy2008 or VirusResponseLab 2009. Win32 Apps.
Right. Safety demo time. Phone going off. Zero contact for 3 weeks. Merry time all. Off the air!!
Air mauritius just lost a customer.
Bloody hell. Air mauritius have completely lost the plot. 2 hour wait in JHB now. Kids a bit thirsty!
Finally. Learning how to wear a seat belt and life jacket. Fascinating stuff! Where's the beers?
Still need to stop in JHB for 2 hours. Damn, i need a beer!
Getting bloody irritated with air mauritius. Been sitting in this plane for over an hour already.
Making progress. Our plane has landed. Mauritius, i'm coming.
Damn, flight is delayed. Those beaches are going to need to wait a couple more hours for me!
1 more sleep until I hit the Mauritian beaches for 3 weeks. No email, no cellphone, no contact. How will I cope??? :-)
13 days to go. Mauritius, here we come!!!
Thanks for all the birthday wishes!!! Yep, I did have a great day and I expect to be hungover until sometime next week.
Just taught my 4 year old to snorkel. He can't get enough of it. Welcome to the underwater world!!!!
Opening a bottle of Alto Rouge. FTW!!
FYI. Cloverfield is a really crap movie. Be warned...
Sick of all the crap, dammit!!!!!!!!
Ok, Jacket and tie dinner with some European Round Tablers coming up. WoooHooo, Prost and all that. Please be quiet in the morning!!!
